title: Orphans get charity, if excess remains after spending on them, can I give it to poor Assim al hakeem
transcript: i have orphans my children and they got they get benefits they get charity money so can i after spending all what they need on them if i have access with me of money can i give it to my needy siblings answer is no this money came for these orphans individually one two three it has to be theirs until they grow up even if it reaches millions of dollars you have no right in giving a penny of them to anyone else
